Name: MARK
Content: MARK is my own perosnal voice assistant for windows. MARK is my graduation project which was made with my fellowe peer using python as a main source of language. Out of 20000 projects, it was the only project to have start-up offer. Languages: Python

Name: Interaction Design
Content: It was a group project which was led by me where we redesigned two streams of humbercurrent.ca as a challenge and it was successfully done by my whole team. Languages: NodeJs, Laravel

Name: Breathing Exercise
Content: It is an exercise which helps people to reduce anxiety and depression from their day to day lives. All they have to do is follow the instructions and do the exercise. Language: JavaScript

Name: Space Exploration
Content: Get latest images of MARS from NASA's API & also shows data of Tesla Roadster's information and images using SpaceX API. Language: NodeJS, HTML/CSS

Name: Exercises for Mental Health
Content: A system which suggest exercises of Yoga according to the issues a person have. User's can also perform CRUD operations in thier account. Languages: ASP.NET
